title: Did California separate the children from their parents who had COVID-19?
subtitle: It seems that one of them was determined to scare families with false rumors during the already stressful corona virus epidemic.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: A letter from the California authorities cautions that residents receiving state aid benefits will no longer be eligible to receive them if they are not tested for COVID-19; moreover, if the parental test is positive, children in their households who are tested negatively will be placed in temporary nurseries until their parents/guardians recover.
